long_description: This neoprene sleeve is useful for keeping the knee warm and providing moderate support. Stretchy neoprene construction offers compression and warmth, promoting circulation and thus enhancing the healing process. Infrapatellar buttress helps support the patella and may improve patellar tracking, and it's lined with CoolMax(R) for moisture management. Not as hot or cumbersome as most knee sleeves because of its modified design below the knee. May help reduce symptoms of tendinitis, arthritis and chondromalacia.
short_description: This neoprene sleeve is useful for keeping the knee warm and providing moderate support.
